name: REBOUND (itch) (Toast_Hatter)
description:
THIS IS A DEMO, It only includes three playable levels, more may be added later on for free

------------------------------ ABOUT ------------------------------

Rebound is a 2d platformer where your only method of attack is to throw a baseball at your enemies! Land combos on enemies, use the environment to your advantage and reach the goal!

Each level has up to five stars the player can collect! They are earned in these ways;

  • Beating the Level
  • Finding the hidden star
  • Beating the default highscore
  • Beating the default best time
  • Completing the level without getting hit once!

------------------------------ CONTROLS ------------------------------

Press ESC to quit at any time

Controller

Throw/Recall - X

Jump - A

Move - Right Stick

Aim - (While X Pressed) Right Stick

Pause - START

Keyboard & Mouse

Throw/Recall - Left Mouse

Jump - Space

Move - Right Stick

Aim - (While Left Mouse Pressed) Mouse Pointer

Pause - BackSpace
